dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.engines
Class ExtGenEngine

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.engines.ExtGenEngine

public class ExtGenEngine
extends java.lang.Object

The TemplateGenEngine provides functionality to run external generator from within the NG-Generator API.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b

isEvalExitCode

public boolean isEvalExitCode()
Returns true, if the exit code of the executed commandline shall be evaluated or ignored. The default is false (ignore exit code).

Returns:
true, if the exit code of the executed commandline shall be evaluated or ignored. The default is false (ignore exit code).
Since:
2009.a

setEvalExitCode

public void setEvalExitCode(boolean evalExitCode)
If set to true, the exit code of the executed commandline will be evaluated. An exit code different from 0 (zero) will be interpreted as an error. If set to false, the exit code will be ignored. The default is false (ignore exit code).

Parameters:
evalExitCode - if set to true, the exit code of the executed commandline will be evaluated. An exit code different from 0 (zero) will be interpreted as an error. If set to false, the exit code will be ignored. The default is false (ignore exit code).
Since:
2009.a

generate

public void generate(java.lang.String commandline)
Executes the external generator that is defined in the given command line.

Parameters:
commandline - The command line of the external generator to run, e.g. ${pluginPath}/bin/gen.exe -f $outputDir$/epcFiles/project.epc -o $outputDir$/src/CanIf_Cfg.c.
Since:
2008.b
